note: Official Chaos Coordinator and Concierge of Mastodon (as well as on-call Mental Health First Aid). Inner-city schoolmarm by day, serious cocktail maker / drinker by night. Semi-serious curler during the winter. Former Gilbert & Sullivan performer and college radio DJ. Married to @rockmastermike.

fields.name: Sport of choice
fields.value: Curling (but I would love to have a running partner for VERY slow miles)

fields.name: Cockail of choice
fields.value: Manhattan (but I wouldn't say no to an Aviation or Mai Tai)

fields.name: Grammar glitch that drives me nuts
fields.value: The use of "literally" to mean "figuratively". This is my (figurative) die-on hill. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ycLc-M2iED4

fields.name: Word I wish I could use more often
fields.value: Defenestration (very tough to work into a conversation)
